markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Rhino Hide Brooch](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1090)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Strength of Thousands</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=155" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #170: Spoken on the Song Wind](/Sources.aspx?ID=97) pg. 76</row>

**Price** 28 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to armor

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Reaction" /><row>envision</row></row>

 

**Trigger** You would take physical damage

 
</row>

</column>

---

This thick brooch is carved from a single piece of rhino hide. It's lacquered and covered in a thin layer of silver dust. When activated, the talisman grants you resistance 5 to physical damage until the end of the current creature's turn. This resistance applies to the triggering attack.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Rhino Hide Brooch
